item.name: confirm_delete
item.message: Do you really want to delete the marked commentd?

item.name: create_error
item.message: While creating the comment an error has occured.

item.name: create_success
item.message: The comment has been created successfully.

item.name: delete_error
item.message: While deleting the marked comments an error has occured.

item.name: delete_success
item.message: The marked comments have been deleted successfully.

item.name: edit_error
item.message: While editing the comment an error has occured.

item.name: edit_success
item.message: The comment has been edited successfully.

item.name: mod_description
item.message: With this module it is possible to create comments for other modules.

item.name: module_doesnt_exist
item.message: Either the selected module doesn\'t exist or is currently deactivated
